news.title: Zelensky's top adviser resigns after Ukrainian anti-corruption raid on his home
news.summary: Andriy Yermak, 54, has been the Ukrainian president's chief of staff throughout Russia's full-scale war.

news.title: Prostate cancer screening should not be offered to most UK men, say experts
news.summary: It recommends that only men with a confirmed genetic risk of prostate cancer should be screened for the disease.

news.title: France to intercept small boats in Channel after pressure from UK
news.summary: The change in policy comes after Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer wrote to President Emmanuel Macron.

news.title: No 10 denies Reeves misled public in run-up to Budget
news.summary: The Conservatives say she was overly gloomy about the public finances as a "smokescreen" to raise tax.

news.title: Romanian teens accused of rape attempt that sparked riots in NI have charges dropped
news.summary: The boys, aged 14 and 15, have been in custody since the alleged assault on 7 June which led to race riots across NI.

news.title: Eight more arrested over fire in Hong Kong that killed at least 128 people
news.summary: Authorities say 89 bodies are unidentified and 79 people remain injured after Wednesday's blaze.

news.title: State pensioners with no other income will not pay tax
news.summary: The chancellor says those who only receive the state pension won't have to pay income tax before 2030.

news.title: Homes of residents in dispute with holiday park company catch fire on same day
news.summary: Residents had appeared in a BBC Panorama programme and were in dispute with a holiday park company.

news.title: Lightning detected on Mars for the first time, scientists say
news.summary: Researchers heard electric crackles on 28 hours of recordings made over two Martian years.

news.title: Parents threatened and blamed by authorities as 1,000 adopted children returned to care
news.summary: Families seeking help for their childrenâ€™s complex needs describe threats of police action against them.
